title: 16 Best Couple Halloween Costumes 2019
text:
Make it a one-and-done — or mix and match. Photo: Buena Vista Pictures

If you can’t bear the thought of making your own unique costume (or simply don’t have the time) for you and your partner, Amazon makes it easy. Almost too easy, since there are hundreds of couple costumes to sift through. So to make it easier, we found 16 Halloween couple costumes, for every type of couple, that are either sold as a pair or can be combined to make a duo. Sure, this is the lazier route, but we think these costumes are timely, funny, and mostly tasteful enough that everyone will still be impressed.

For the couple who composts

VIVO Large Beekeeping Suit $22 (was $33, now 33% off) This beekeeper suit is professional-grade, so consider picking up a new hobby after Halloween is over. $22 at Amazon Buy $22 at Amazon Buy

For the couple who loves pop culture

Dreamgirl Women’s Disco Doll Costume At first glance this might look like a retro costume, but this is actually Maddy in Euphoria and Michael Cera. From $28 at Amazon Buy From $28 at Amazon Buy

For the couple who loves memes

Rasta Imposta Lightweight Banana Costume Your gorilla partner will say you’re looking like a snack all night long in this banana costume. $15 at Amazon Buy $15 at Amazon Buy

For the “this will do” couple

WitHelper DylunSky Halloween Latex Mask Moon Men Mask Yes, that’s just an emoji costume, not technically a sun, and we’re unsure about the ventilation in this crescent moon mask, but after a few spooky cocktails the weirdness of this outer space pairing will start to wear off. $20 at Amazon Buy $20 at Amazon Buy

For the couple that drives a Tesla

For the couple who loves sports

For the couple with perfect smiles

Tigerdoe Toothbrush and Toothpaste Costume If you own a water pick and spend most of Halloween worried that all the candy is going to rot your teeth, this costume is for you. $30 at Amazon Buy $30 at Amazon Buy

For a couple of oenophiles

FunWorld Perfectly Paired Wine And Cheese Set $45 (was $49, now 8% off) This wine-and-cheese couple costume works well for a classy and crass pair, as the cheese slice and knife could easily be repurposed next year for a very literal “cutting the cheese” solo costume. $45 at Amazon Buy $45 at Amazon Buy

For the vegan couple

For the couple who loves PDA

Rasta Imposta Lightweight Plug and Socket Couples Costume Be mindful when choosing your partner-in-Halloween-crime for this suggestive costume: According to reviewers, the plug portion actually fits into the socket side. $43 at Amazon Buy $43 at Amazon Buy

For the couple who loves to play games

Fun World King and Queen of Hearts Costumes This king and queen of hearts card costume is perfect for the couple that loves to play games. (But also, if you want to play some real games on Halloween, here are some expert-recommended picks.) $31 at Amazon Buy $31 at Amazon Buy

For the couple who loves the classics

For the couple who likes word games

Tigerdoe Salt and Pepper Costume Paired with an angular wig, gold hoops, and spandex under these tunics, you can easily toe the line between salt and pepper, the seasonings, and Salt-N-Pepa, the ’80s rap group. $32 at Amazon Buy $32 at Amazon Buy

For the throuple

For the couple who loves peak TV

California Costumes Men’s The Pope His Divine Holiness Hot priests are having a moment, and The New Pope is coming back with even more hot clergy, so why not lean into it? Carry a flask full of your holiest water to complete the look. $34 at Amazon Buy $34 at Amazon Buy
